LOCAL_LAW_NUMBER: Tree Protection Local Law (current)
OTHER_EXEMPTIONS: Works within 2m/TPZ controls (see page)
NOTES: Permit needed to prune/remove/works near tree that meets canopy thresholds.

LOCAL_LAW_NUMBER: Canopy Tree Protection Local Law
OTHER_EXEMPTIONS: Minor pruning up to 10% canopy; branches ≤10 cm circumference
NOTES: References Clause 52.37 (Canopy Trees) alignment.

LOCAL_LAW_NUMBER: Community Amenity Local Law 2023 (Clause 55)
OTHER_EXEMPTIONS: See Community Amenity Local Law 2023
NOTES: Significant Tree Permit required in addition to any Planning Permit if applicable.

LOCAL_LAW_NUMBER: General Local Law 2016 – Significant Trees
OTHER_EXEMPTIONS: Two triggers: 40cm diameter OR on Urban Forest/Significant Tree Register
NOTES: Measure at ground or 1.5m.

LOCAL_LAW_NUMBER: No private tree local law (ETR via Planning)
OTHER_EXEMPTIONS: Private trees protected where listed on Exceptional Tree Register (Planning controls apply)
NOTES: Council states it does not have authority over private trees except via ETR planning controls.

LOCAL_LAW_NUMBER: Local Law (private trees)
SIZE_THRESHOLD_CIRCUMFERENCE_M: 1.55 at 1.0m (single or combined; multi-trunk add 4 largest)
NOTES: Clause 52.37 (Canopy Trees) referenced on page.

LOCAL_LAW_NUMBER: General Local Law – Significant Trees
OTHER_EXEMPTIONS: Tree Protection Zone works also controlled
NOTES: Permit required to prune/remove/undertake works on or near a Significant Tree.

LOCAL_LAW_NUMBER: Local Law – Mature/Significant Tree permit
OTHER_EXEMPTIONS: Planning permit takes precedence if required
NOTES: Tree Works Permit needed to prune >15% canopy or remove where tree is mature/significant or protected via planning.
